name: Meteor_extensions
notes: 1.  Meteor.callPromise extracted from https://github.com/deanius/meteor-promise/ to reduce version conflicts

summary: Gets a ES2015-compatible Promise for the result of a Meteor.promise
name: callPromise

description: Main entry point for client code. All common routines are imported here.
name: main
notes: 1. Meteor_extensions.js and themeFiles.scss are eagerly loaded at startup.

description: Layout for Cards Page. Builds two sample cards with different configurations
name: cards
listForm_route
notes: 1.  Remember to register this page at /imports/both/routes

name: template_route
notes: 1.  Remember to register this page at /imports/both/routes

params.description: flag to shape menu for use at bottom
params.name: bottom

description: Main / top Svelte component for this application
name: App
notes:
1. context: "Version" - app version info
     2. context: "icon<Name>" - imports svg file from library and insert into returned object

     3. systemGlobals: "documents" - mongodb doc options / limits
     4. systemGlobals: "colors" - hex colour values
     5. systemGlobals: "colorArrays" - array of hex colour values for threshold colour change
     6. systemGlobals: "components" - css strings for components
     7. systemGlobals: "theme" - css strings for theming items

name: MainPage
notes:
1. Imports an object that holds the page route information
     2. When a new url is detected, the page will be rendered into the main page area

name: routes
examples:
Typical route object
         name =          {String} link that router will use, ie "/home"
         layout =        {Object} MainPage layout Svelte object
         component =     {Object} Page Svelte specific component
         redirectTo =    {String} (optional) link to redirect page request to
         onlyIf =        {Object} (optional) { guard: userIsAdmin, redirect: '/login' }; block access if guard is false

         icon =          {String} navbar icon to show from global context (app page), ie. "iconLearn"
         label =         {String} navbar text to show, ie. i18n(PageText, "navLabel", lang)

         roles =         {Array} roles that can see this link in navbar and be routed to, ie. ["all"]

         group =         {Number} for side navigation; group routes into a block
         isNavMobile =   {Boolean} (optional) show link in mobile nav block at bottom or top
notes:
1. route objects are located within the associated page directory under /imports/both/pages<pageName>
 2. the order of the page route objects in the returned array determines the page order

description: Client side constants to set up the environment. This file provides a single entry point to provide consistency across all pages, components and elements.
name: systemGlobals

returns.description: components - bulma css values for cards etc.
elements - bulma css values for key buttons.
theme - bulma css values for theming items

summary: Gets svg icons ready for insertion into top level app context
name: systemIcons

returns.description: out - holds the icon svg info in json format

notes: 1. Icon information is compatible with Font Awesome 5 format {prefix, iconName, icon: [path]}

description: Simple box container with slot for any type of content. Use as a template for building components
name: box

description: Simple icon display component for Fontawesome5 formatted json objects.
name: icon

1. Standalone component that gets a configuration object from its parent
2. The content area can include html tags
3. Content can only be create and controlled by administrators.

notes:
1. Standalone component that gets a configuration object from its parent
2. The content area can include html tags
3. Content can only be create and controlled by administrators.

summary: Adjusts hex colour value up (to 100 percent; lighter) or down (to -100 percent; darker).
name: adjustHexColor

summary: Add commas to big numbers and returns a string
name: numString

summary: Take a string of digits and convert into a formatted number adjusted by a scaling factor
name: formatNumber

summary: Build numbers as fractions; num needs conversion and fraction is 8ths, 4trs, halfs.
name: fractionalNumber

returns.description: imperial number fraction converted to fractional amount

summary: Round number to specified number of digits; if digits is '0', return an integer.
name: toDecimals

returns.description: float number to specified number of digits

summary: Gets an object and finds text string based on user language preference.
name: i18n

params.description: field in the main imported text object
params.name: field

summary: For use by widgets; gets info from the flow object, extracts colour information and sets a background display colour.
name: setBackground

params.description: widget configuration object that holds colour information
params.name: conf

description: Meteor method to scan for svelte files and build documentation.
name: buildDSvelteJsdoc

summary: Builds client side icon set from icon sets from line awesome files in public directory.
name: lineAwesomeIcons
notes:
1. "from" folder contains .svg files  (typically line awesome files)
 2. "to" folder receives .svg files converted into javascript array
     compatible with Fontawesome 5 icons.

summary: Meteor method to query server directly to get first document from a collection.
name: getDocId

summary: Meteor method to query server directly tfor system wide information.
name: getSysInfo

summary: Meteor method to query server directly for documents.
name: directCollection
